trends: There have been no other sightings in Gretna
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: While driving on interstate 10 heading west from New Orleans to Baton Rouge. I was on the I-10 about 10 miles outside of New Orleans. I was on the part of the I-10 that crosses over the southwestern edge of Lake Pontchartrain. It was a partly cloudy day and I saw a bright flash that was behind a cloud. Now this may sound like lightning but there was something unusual about it because it was mostly a sunny morning around 6:30 am. It almost looked like several camera flashes went off behind this white cloud. It was really something special. There were several flashes within about 1-2 seconds no sound. This is when it got real interseting. I continued to watch the cloud when a bright round ballshaped object came out from behind the cloud. It was round and looked like a small sun about the size of a softball. It moved a little to the right (west to east) and then took of at about a 35 degree angle upward. I was out of sight within a second so whatever it was was travelling at an incredible speed. I really don t beleive in UFO s as ET s but this was either some kind of natural phenomenon like ball lightning or it really was some type of vehicle. The only thing though. Since it looked like a small ball of fire it really didn t strike me as a craft. It seemed more like a natural event. I emailed a local weathermen and his reply was "I have no idea what it was" FYI
